messages.title: CHANGE CAN'T WAIT
messages.content: Local mum and Green councillor, Sharron Sumner has been chosen by Kingston and Surbiton Green Party to stand at the general election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sharron's priorities are to stop Brexit,
protect the borough's trees and green spaces,

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Greens are on the rise in Kingston and Surbiton and beat both Labour and the Conservatives the last time local people voted.

issues.brexitEurope: Sharron's priorities are to stop Brexit
issues.environment: tackle the climate emergency, protect the borough's trees and green spaces

leaflet.personalStatement: Local mum and Green councillor, Sharron Sumner has been chosen by Kingston and Surbiton Green Party to stand at the general election.

images.caption: Sharron Sumner standing next to a street sign for Pear Tree Way in Old Malden.
